snippet: In a federal study of 2008 data, New Jersey and Hawaii were the only states where less than a quarter of the population using a public water supply received fluoride in the water.
lead_paragraph: In a federal study of 2008 data, New Jersey and Hawaii were the only states where less than a quarter of the population using a public water supply received fluoride in the water.

headline.seo: More Fluoridated Water, But Not In New Jersey
headline.main: More Fluoridated Water, but Not in New Jersey
